name: Christmas Card Making
description:
"Christmas Card Making " is Free to Play

Instantly make Christmas wishes card in One Minute.

Very Easy to make & send the creative Christmas cards.
Send Christmas Wishes to you Relative and Friends.

This is Best Card making game. Really you never seen before.
1000+ Combination for Christmas card.

No. of Christmas Trees,Santa,Snow mas,Quotes.
100+ HD Backgrounds.

Play More Christmas Games with Megan Rozi
